info.name: Nag Control
info.description: Since both Facebook and Pinterest track your activity when you're logged in, I made this style to get rid of the login-nag that covers the screen. With this style, you can browse both Facebook and Pinterest freely, without logging in.
info.additionalInfo:
I will add support for other sites in the future.


V.1 : A slight glitch with Pinterest right border. Some Pinterest pages still have a login prompt. -the prompt is unstylable, but currently not on many pages.

V1.1 Fixed Facebook timed popup.

V2 Fixed page not loading  with facebook, I noted out "._5h60 " you may want to try with it enabled however.

V3 Fixed Issue in V2. Plus -- Got rid of another nag at facebook. :)
